moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Removes physical and special damage-reducing effects from the opponents’ field of play.

passives.name: Wide Awake
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Once per battle, charges the user’s move gauge by two when the user is in a pinch.

passives.name: Paralysis Synergy 3
passives.description: Powers up moves when the target is paralyzed.
